pages.text: You've found that $(item)Lapis$() is a good stabilization agent for the $(item)Unstable Glitch Fragments$()$(br2)After the fragments are $(item)Stable$() they desparetely seek out a material to latch onto, you think that $(item)Gold$() might be strong enough as a $(item)Host$().$(br2)It's a delicate process, and it needs to be performed in $(item)Water$() or the materials won't bind properly.
